name: play
description: Play songs, artists, albums, playlists, or podcasts on a media provider.

query.description: A non-empty string specifying the content to search for.

intent_type.description: The type of content to play, which must be one of the following: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", or "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The content type to filter by: `ALBUM`, `PLAYLIST`, or `TRACK`.

name: search
description: Searches for songs, artists, albums, playlists, or podcasts on a media provider.

query.description: A non-empty string representing the content to search for.

intent_type.description: The type of content to search for, which must be one of: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", or "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The type of content to filter by, which must be `ALBUM`, `PLAYLIST`, or `TRACK`.
